WRITING.TITLE: We all know which technique is superior

WRITING.TEXT: Didn't read it yet,began with NT and now i began OT,I'll read all of the SS after
Depends on the person,some like Misaki other don't ,the volume wasn't bad per say but i didn't cared about Misaki enough and thought that the antagonist deserved to win more then her
Misakitard,can t like her,especially not after her tantrum in NT22R
idk who novels u talked about lol,think u mixed them up not me
Because they are good characters,unlike her

the only one volume i didn't liked is 8,idc about misaki enough to put her higher on the list and even thou world rejecter saga was inferior to Othinus and Coronzon saga it was still very good the only average vol being 16 and even that had good moments(all Touma-Kamisato interactions for example are good in my opinion)
ok,it was a semi-troll comment,but I like those characters more than Misaki,i just can't like her it happens
Yes,it was a good and fun volume
I really have no idea why people don't like it and say it isn't good,but whatever

Yuiitsu was acting out of revenge,not a deep motivation like Othinus and Coronzon so it makes sense that her plan wasn't very detailed and I feel like we don't know enough of how Kamisato got his harem to be able to judge that aspect

It isn't thou,it's the natural continuation of NT13 because we find out who is the guy that is the natural predator of the magic gods and he is a nice contrast to Touma,because they are both very similar and very different at the same time

I have no idea from where "and every other character including Academy City as Whole gets PIS to hype them up" came from and Salome and Kamisto himself for example is definately not a Gary/Mary Sue and we didn't got enough of his harem to characterize them and unlike the other villains Yuiitsu was acting only out of revenge so it makes sense that her and her plan isn't very detailed

WRITING.TITLE: We all know which technique is superior

WRITING.TEXT: She's a Kihara,it better to not underestimate them and the heat wave wasn't that bad, I agree with Misaka part,but i think it was because Kamachi began shoe horning Misaka after NT13(worst offender of that in my opinion being her and Misaki's inclusions in the Coronzon arc because Misaki did nothing there and Misaka's involvement was so small that she could've been easily replaced by Itsuwa)
yeah,Kamachi should really stop shoe horning her and Misaki for popularity reasons and put them only in volumes in which it would make sense
bruh St.Germaine is the top of the pecking order,don't question that and Anna is too pridefull and ignorant just like many powerfull characters from the magic side
hmm...If I'm not wrong,his powerboost in gt came from the fact that the pill was a lot more aggresive then the one in NT,might be wrong thou

knowing Aiwass he most likely let himself be beaten,cause he doesn't seem to like Anna that much(unlike Touma and Aleister which he found interesting/liked them) and he also likes trolling from time to time

you forgot the fact that she also wants revenge on Aleister cause he's the one that sent Noukan to face Kamisato and the harem didn't trusted Touma enough to think he can bring Kamisato back without WR and they were panicked and in complete chaos

they were afraid because she might destroy the hand before they killed her which might'be been the only way to bring him back and she did that to Touma just for the heck of it(character flaw not plot flaw because she was too confident she won)
I don't,that part was a joke

they don't know if she might have a secret weapon hidden there or something and she could for example step on the arm or something to mess with it and haven't u saw what happens irl when people are in complete panic?they tend to do very stupid things and not think logicaly at all (people buying crazy amounts of toilet paper at the beggining of the pandemic is the 1st example i can't think of)and her plan to get revenge on aleister isn't explained at all to us,only that she wants to make everyone a kihara (i don't remember much of that part).

Again,people don't think clearly when in panic and to figure how to bring him back in a panic like that would be hard + it needed thinking outside the box to do it which would've been hard since they were too scared and also on an indecisive state when chasing Touma since he helped them in NT16 ,they were put in a very stressfull situation since even if Yuiitsu had 1% chance of destroying the arm it was too much for them in the panicked state to risk it

Fran was an outlier cause she was originaly Lola's spy so she was able to think clearly from the begging(even thou she fell in love with him later) and as u seen in the epilogue of NT16 they really were in complete chaos then and even thou they calmed down a little,because of the earlier panick they didn't thought another way to bring him back was possible

and they still didn't have a plan, despite having multiple plans on how to kill -a side effect of the pannic from earlier,that feeling of not having another way lingered on them even after they calmed down yet they just trust Yuiitsu for some reason -they don't really trust her but they think they have no other choise and they also don't trust Touma enough to leave everything in his hands either
She wasn't monitoring them cause she was too confident,and yes that was stupid for her and since we don't know much about them personaly there's no other explanation I can find
It wasn't NT22 ,it was NT22R,which is basically NT23,she basically throwed a tantrum that made things very complicated
I'm not saying the volume is perfect by any means,and I like it for what it is,not what it isn't/could've been so I'm not really the best at defending it
It's a very spoilery and complicated situation
Can you try and see what happens if Thor is the prompt word? I m curious how it will end
I'm a bit out of the loop with that, who did what with him?
Lol, he only has a line and poof, Touma x misaka fanfic instead
Well, at least the result was funny
